info.gridworld.critters

Class ChameleonCritter

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • info.gridworld.actor.Critter
        • info.gridworld.critters.ChameleonCritter

  • public class ChameleonCritter
extends info.gridworld.actor.Critter
    A ChameleonCritter takes on the color of neighboring actors as it moves through the grid.
    The implementation of this class is testable on the AP CS A and AB exams.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ChameleonCritter() 

    • Method Summary

      void makeMove(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
      Turns towards the new location as it moves.
      void processActors(java.util.ArrayList<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> actors)
      Randomly selects a neighbor and changes this critter's color to be the same as that neighbor's.

    • Method Detail

      • processActors

        public void processActors(java.util.ArrayList<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> actors)
        Randomly selects a neighbor and changes this critter's color to be the same as that neighbor's. If there are no neighbors, no action is taken.
        Overrides:
        processActors in class info.gridworld.actor.Critter
        Parameters:
        actors - the actors to be processed

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
        Turns towards the new location as it moves.
        Overrides:
        makeMove in class info.gridworld.actor.Critter
        Parameters:
        loc - the location to move to
